## 2.0.0 - 2026-01-19

- Add splash screen and loading spinner.
- Add Xtream API support with TV/Movie/Series modes and episode selection.
- Fix EPG parser to handle case-insensitive `tvg-id`.
- Add packaging, release script, docs, and assets for GitHub/PyPI.

## 1.0.0 - 2026-01-10

- Initial public release.
- Core TUI for IPTV with EPG, favorites, search, categories, and playback.
